item.title: 有用的技巧
item.description: 从GitHub下载单个文件 Go to the file you want to download. Click it to view the contents within the GitHub UI. In the top right, right click the Raw button. Save as… 来自 https://stackoverflow.com/questions/4604663/download-single-files-from-github
